column4: can u help? my audio device is busy always, only when i run a .mov files. how do i fix it ? i work on Hardy
have you tried to use a different player?
s, it works, also in same application VLC, audio works, video works, but not the .mov format
u still there?
ah, sorry. Never had the problem, so I don't know... but I would suggest trying to try the Karmic Live CD to see if it's fixed now.
its ok, i am planning to get to 10.04 from 8.04
one person asked me to kill something after that it worked fine, but again after restart, its with same prob
PulseAudio, maybe?
whts that?
PulseAudio is the sound server, I figured that was the application you killed... but does sound play at all? Or does it just cause high CPU usage?
sound plays, all other files are played in VLC and amarok, only the .mov extension file is not played in VLC, it says audio device is busy, used by other program?
what about mplayer, can it play mov files?
sorry i don use it as it wont play .mp3, will just check
sorry by default it was opening in MPlayer, i actually had set to VLC
u actually solved my prob :) thx
VLC always have saved me
so it works in VLC? Or mplayer?
works with VLC, no
not MPlayer
ah, alright. good to know.
better v suggest alsa and VLC for all
thx a lot for helping
